creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: outdoor scene of foreign settlement; Dutch men in long, brocade coats with colorful leggings engaged in various outdoor activities; two men at LR engage with a small black dog on a white leash; a man with a walking stick stands at bottom center; a man on a horse points ahead to his attendant at LR; man on white horse facing away from viewer holds a bow with a quiver of arrows in PL hand; man with white brocade coat and red legs holds a longbow behind his back in PR hand; two men stroll in front of an arched bridge that crosses a stream fed by a mountain waterfall; other men engaged in archery, horseback riding, and other activities in very back; thick forest at L and R sides; mountain range at UR and UL; stone building with dome, topped with red and white flag in LRQ; series of white buildings and towers in ULQ
title: Scene of Foreigners
